title: He Was Accused of Enabling Abuse. Then Came a Downward Spiral.

author: Jose A. Del Real
title: Iranians in Los Angeles Shed Few Tears for Suleimani. But What Comes Next?
description: Amid painful memories, members of the Iranian-American diaspora in Los Angeles are navigating mixed feelings about the Trump administration’s escalation with Iran.
